title: Document skill authoring best practices for token efficiency
description:
Create documentation for optimal skill token budgets based on the Agent Skills spec and audit findings.

## Key Guidelines to Document

### Token Budgets (from Agent Skills spec)
- Metadata (name + description): ~100 tokens
- SKILL.md body: <5000 tokens recommended (<500 lines)
- References: loaded on demand, keep files focused

### Progressive Disclosure
1. Essential instructions in SKILL.md
2. Detailed reference material in separate files
3. Templates/assets loaded only when needed

### Bloat Patterns to Avoid
- Repetitive examples (consolidate into one comprehensive set)
- Redundant workflow descriptions across files
- Verbose explanations that could be concise
- Excessive whitespace and formatting overhead
- Deep reference chains (keep 1 level deep)

### Optimization Techniques
- Use relative paths for file references
- Keep reference files under 5000 tokens each
- Prefer concise markdown over verbose explanations
- Cross-reference rather than duplicate content

## Deliverable
- Create docs/skill-authoring-guidelines.md
- Update AGENTS.md with token budget guidance
- Reference the Agent Skills spec: https://agentskills.io/llms.txt
